Translations.Text: Tak bahato dokaziv u nebi ta zemli dayutʹsya yim, ale vony prokhodyatʹ povz nykh, neuvazhno
bilʹshistʹ tsykh khto viryatʹ v BOHU ne roblyatʹ tak bez toho, shchob zdiysnyuvaty idola obozhnyuyutʹ
vony harantuvaly shcho perevazhnyy retribution z BOHA ne vrazyty yikh, abo Hodyna ne prybude yim raptom, koly vony naymenshi ochikuyutʹ tse
Kazhutʹ, "Tse miy shlyakh: YA zaproshuyu do BOHA, na osnovi yasnoho dokazu, ta tak roblyu tsi khto slidkuyutʹ meni. BOH glorified. YA ye ne idol worshiper

My ne poslaly pered tym, yak vy krim lyudey komu my nadykhnuly, vybrani z lyudey riznomanitnykh spilʹnot. Vony ne blukaly zemlya ta pobachyla naslidky dlya tsykh pered tym, yak yim? abode U maybutnʹomu daleko krashche dlya tsykh khto vedutʹ spravedlyve zhyttya. Chy ne mohly b vy todi zrozumity

Tilʹky koly rozpach kur'yeriv, ta dumayutʹ shcho vony buly vidkynuti, nashoyu peremohoyu prybuvaye yim. My todi ryatuyemo whomever my vybyrayemo, v toy chas, yak nash retribution dlya vynuvatykh lyudey unavoidable

U yikhniy istoriyi, ye urok dlya tsykh khto volodiyutʹ rozvidkoyu. Tse ne vyhotovlyayetʹsya Hadith; tse (Quran) pidtverdzhuye vsi poperedni svyati pysannya, zabezpechuye detali vse, ta ye beacon ta myloserdya dlya tsykh khto vvazhayutʹ
